description.translate: It takes at least an arm like that to handle it.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Le bras du géant\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il faut au moins un bras comme\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ça pour la manier.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7It takes at least an arm\"}","{\"text\":\"§7like that to handle it.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7SPD§c-2\"}"]}}
